metadata.title: CVE-2024-36902 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ipv6:fib6_rules: avoid possible NULL dereference in fib6_rule_action() syzbot isable to trigger the following crash [1], caused by unsafe ip6_dst_idev()use. Indeed ip6_dst_idev() can return NULL, and must always be checked.
